UniprotID	Q6PIU2
Accession	Q6PIU2;B7Z2K4;B7Z3A1;B7Z5U2;B7Z906;B7ZAW6;F5H7K4;Q86WZ1;Q9P2I4
EntryName	NCEH1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Neutral cholesterol ester hydrolase 1 (NCEH) (EC 3.1.1.-) (Acetylalkylglycerol acetylhydrolase) (2-acetyl MAGE hydrolase) (EC 3.1.1.71) (Arylacetamide deacetylase-like 1)
GeneName	NCEH1 AADACL1 KIAA1363
Length	408
Function	Hydrolyzes 2-acetyl monoalkylglycerol ether (1-O-alkyl-2-acetyl-sn-glycerol), the penultimate precursor of the pathway for de novo synthesis of platelet-activating factor (PubMed:17052608). May be responsible for the hydrolysis of cholesterol esters (such as cholesteryl (9Z-octadecenoate)) in macrophages (By similarity). Also involved in organ detoxification by hydrolyzing exogenous organophosphorus compounds (By similarity). May contribute to cancer pathogenesis by promoting tumor cell migration (PubMed:17052608).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Microsome
Disorder	0.0157,0.0120,0.0133,0.0097,0.0104,0.0113,0.0088,0.0071,0.0066,0.0057,0.0050,0.0064,0.0047,0.0052,0.0052,0.0062,0.0061,0.0081,0.0120,0.0133,0.0095,0.0143,0.0130,0.0119,0.0119,0.0094,0.0115,0.0160,0.0294,0.0214,0.0405,0.0780,0.0506,0.0985,0.0888,0.0568,0.0568,0.0985,0.0568,0.0263,0.0227,0.0244,0.0146,0.0240,0.0184,0.0313,0.0555,0.0494,0.0341,0.0188,0.0320,0.0181,0.0198,0.0125,0.0081,0.0057,0.0057,0.0057,0.0037,0.0049,0.0066,0.0066,0.0093,0.0115,0.0076,0.0107,0.0108,0.0094,0.0099,0.0105,0.0168,0.0136,0.0240,0.0240,0.0568,0.1184,0.0985,0.1611,0.1643,0.2129,0.2328,0.1643,0.1671,0.1162,0.0690,0.1476,0.1501,0.1731,0.2328,0.2224,0.3286,0.3494,0.4476,0.4652,0.3529,0.3392,0.3286,0.4582,0.3667,0.2951,0.2752,0.1643,0.2328,0.2292,0.3053,0.4292,0.3019,0.2715,0.1611,0.1184,0.1184,0.0817,0.0719,0.0341,0.0294,0.0294,0.0174,0.0184,0.0205,0.0188,0.0191,0.0349,0.0531,0.0389,0.0313,0.0349,0.0398,0.0443,0.0605,0.0870,0.0690,0.0380,0.0300,0.0300,0.0300,0.0334,0.0341,0.0646,0.0334,0.0194,0.0398,0.0631,0.0372,0.0263,0.0174,0.0244,0.0244,0.0231,0.0223,0.0202,0.0269,0.0263,0.0306,0.0494,0.0398,0.0765,0.0676,0.0676,0.0313,0.0327,0.0518,0.0506,0.0581,0.0592,0.0605,0.1323,0.1115,0.0592,0.0414,0.0494,0.0555,0.0592,0.0909,0.1399,0.0799,0.0631,0.0327,0.0334,0.0592,0.1298,0.1969,0.1702,0.1476,0.1349,0.2064,0.2034,0.1671,0.1424,0.1852,0.1501,0.2094,0.2034,0.1852,0.0967,0.0985,0.1731,0.2541,0.3117,0.3117,0.2224,0.2064,0.2224,0.2575,0.1759,0.1731,0.0985,0.1643,0.1643,0.1251,0.0870,0.0870,0.1048,0.0631,0.0349,0.0799,0.0618,0.0341,0.0349,0.0214,0.0240,0.0433,0.0531,0.0473,0.0269,0.0494,0.0518,0.1007,0.0605,0.0851,0.1449,0.2609,0.2470,0.1424,0.2328,0.3249,0.2292,0.1942,0.2328,0.1528,0.2609,0.1643,0.0888,0.0463,0.0518,0.0531,0.0248,0.0240,0.0214,0.0380,0.0198,0.0205,0.0101,0.0115,0.0188,0.0136,0.0107,0.0104,0.0104,0.0138,0.0223,0.0227,0.0405,0.0780,0.0704,0.0704,0.0799,0.1671,0.1852,0.1583,0.1229,0.1671,0.1048,0.1969,0.2292,0.2258,0.1759,0.2328,0.2258,0.3019,0.2817,0.1852,0.1137,0.1298,0.1092,0.1
